Original:
林口滬曉悅餐酒館是一家集美食與調酒於一身的餐廳，無論是家庭聚餐還是朋友聚會，這裡都能滿足你對美食和氛圍的所有期待。

餐廳環境
首先，這裡的裝潢相當別緻，結合了現代設計與傳統中國風，營造出一個舒適又高雅的用餐氛圍。寬敞的用餐區和溫馨的燈光讓人感到放鬆愉快。包廂設計更是體貼周到，提供了私密性，適合各類聚會和宴請。

美食介紹
炒牛肉：

這道炒牛肉色香味俱全，牛肉片嫩滑多汁，搭配上新鮮的彩椒和洋蔥，提升了整體的風味。牛肉的鮮嫩與蔬菜的爽脆相互襯托，每一口都讓人滿足。
脆炸魷魚：

魷魚經過精心調味，外皮炸得酥脆金黃，而內裡的魷魚鮮嫩多汁，不會過於油膩，口感極佳，是一道非常受歡迎的小吃。
炒時蔬：

這道菜使用了新鮮的秋葵和各種菇類，搭配簡單的調味，保留了蔬菜的原汁原味，清爽可口，非常適合追求健康飲食的朋友。
清炒高麗菜：

高麗菜新鮮脆口，搭配上少許的紅辣椒點綴，不僅增添了色彩，還帶來了一點點微辣的刺激感，非常開胃。
調酒推薦
滬曉悅的調酒師傅技藝高超，創意十足，每一款調酒都讓人耳目一新。

東方之珠：

這款調酒融合了中國茶和西方烈酒，口感豐富，層次分明，既有茶的清香，又有酒的濃烈，讓人一飲難忘。
熱帶風情：

以新鮮水果和朗姆酒為基底，這款調酒帶來了濃郁的熱帶風情，酸甜適中，清爽解渴，是夏日的不二選擇。
經典馬丁尼：

對於喜歡經典口味的顧客來說，馬丁尼是個不錯的選擇。這款調酒酒香濃郁，口感醇厚，經典的味道讓人回味無窮。
服務與體驗
餐廳的服務也非常值得一提，工作人員友善且專業，從點餐到上菜都表現得非常周到。無論是介紹菜品還是調酒，他們都能提供詳盡的說明，讓客人能更好地體驗每一道美食和每一款調酒。

總結
總的來說，林口滬曉悅餐酒館無論在美食、調酒還是用餐環境上都表現出色，是一個非常值得推薦的餐飲場所。無論是家庭聚餐、朋友聚會還是浪漫約會，這裡都能讓你滿載而歸。
EN:
Linkou Hu Xiaoyue Restaurant is a restaurant that integrates food and bartender. Whether it is a family dinner or a friend's party, it can satisfy all your expectations for food and atmosphere.

Restaurant environment
First of all, the decoration here is quite chic, combining modern design and traditional Chinese style, creating a comfortable and elegant dining atmosphere.The spacious dining area and warm light make people feel relaxed and happy.The box design is more thoughtful and provides privacy, suitable for all kinds of gatherings and banquets.

Food introduction
Stir -fried beef:

This fried beef is full of flavors, and the beef slices are tender and juicy. They are matched with fresh color peppers and onions, which enhance the overall flavor.The tenderness of the beef and the crispy of the vegetables are set off, and each bite is satisfied.
Crispy fried squid:

After careful seasoning, the skin is crispy and golden, while the squid inside is tender and juicy, it will not be too greasy, and the taste is excellent. It is a very popular snack.
Stir -fried vegetables:

This dish uses fresh okra and various mushrooms, with simple seasoning, retains the original flavor of the vegetables, refreshing and delicious, and is very suitable for friends who are pursuing a healthy diet.
Stir -fried Korean cuisine:

Kaga vegetables are fresh and crispy, with a little red pepper embellishment, which not only adds color, but also brings a little spicy irritation, which is very appetizing.
Bart -up recommendation
Hu Xiaoyue's bartending master has superb skills and creativity, and every bartending is refreshing.

Oriental Pearl:

This bartending combines Chinese tea and western spirits. It has a rich taste and clear layers. It has the fragrance of tea and the strong wine, which makes people unforgettable.
Tropical style:

Based on fresh fruits and rum wines, this bartending brings a strong tropical style, moderate sweetness and sweetness, refreshing thirst, which is the best choice for summer.
Classic Martini:

For customers who like classic flavors, Martini is a good choice.This bartender has a strong aroma and mellow taste, and the classic taste makes people have endless aftertaste.
Service and experience
The service of the restaurant is also worth mentioning. The staff is friendly and professional, and it is very thoughtful from ordering to ordering.Whether you introduce dishes or bartending, they can provide detailed explanations so that guests can better experience every food and every bartender.

Summarize
In general, Linkou Huxiao Yue Mealing Pavilion has performed well in terms of food, bartending, or dining environment. It is a very recommended restaurant.Whether it is a family dinner, a friend's party or a romantic date, you can return here.

Original: 今年一月起，去吃了三次，前兩次的餐點都很好吃，每次吃完對它的海鮮炒飯都難以忘懷。第一次還有點點了茄子跟醉雞，真的都很好吃。第二次新嘗試了蘆筍蝦仁跟XO醬中卷（嗎？）還有高麗菜，也都很好吃！蘆筍蝦仁香氣很足夠、XO醬中卷外面裹了一層很薄的東西，看起來不油膩、吃起來也不油膩。高麗菜更是好吃，看起來會硬硬的菜吃起來很脆，而且又很甜。但是第三次去的時候發現炒飯變鹹了、高麗菜偏軟也沒那麼甜… 中卷看起來油亮油亮的… 讓人有些失望… 但若是品質能再像前兩次吃的那樣，真的是一家令人百吃不膩的店！
EN: From January this year, I went to eat three times. The meals of the previous two times were delicious. Every time I finished eating, it was unforgettable for its seafood fried rice.For the first time, I had some eggplant and drunk chicken, which was really delicious.The second time I tried the rolls of asparagus shrimp and XO sauce (?) And cabbage, which was also delicious!The aroma of asparagus shrimp is enough, and a very thin layer of things wrapped outside the rolls of the XO sauce.Kaga cuisine is even more delicious, and it looks brittle and sweet.But when I went to the third time, I found that the fried rice became salty, the Korean cabbage was soft and not so sweet ... The middle roll looked bright and bright ... it was a little disappointed ... but if the quality could be eaten again, it was really It is a well -eating shop!
